# Cathy Stewart

| birth_date     =
| birth_place    = Royan, France
| death_date     =
| death_place    = Breuillet, Charente-Maritime, France
| occupation     = Actress
| years_active   = 1976–1986
| other_names    = Cathy Greiner
}}
Cathy Stewart (2 April 1956 – 9 August 1994) was a French pornographic actress who appeared in the majority of France's hardcore films between 1976 and the early eighties. She also appeared in several non-pornographic pictures, most notably Jean Rollin's 1980 horror film La Nuit des Traqu√©es where she was credited under her real name (Catherine Greiner).
Suffering from drug addiction, she stopped her acting career in the 1980s, and died from an overdose in August 1994.
